title: Skin Ivern

embed.description: Hades job was a large burden even for a god. Hades had to lead these souls blindfolded, so they wont give a single look to this dreadful place, because this could turn them into one of the crooked trees and stay in there forever.

body: Non potete assumerlo come Rioter per fare delle nuove skin? questo tizzio è veramente bravo :o{{champion:427}}
